title: Pics of 3/4 Rusty Lee R&R Fitted in LHD Bus

posts.content:
Hi,
Could someone please post some pictures of a 3/4 R&R bed fitted in an early LHD bus. It's the mounting points I'm interested in as I'm struggling to fit the bed which I've had for years. Maybe LHD and RHD are different and mines not LHD but without something to compare it's difficult to know. Are the fittings for early and late buses all the same.

Thanks

there all the same, look at the assembled picture on his website, put yours altogether, place it in the bus, get the front frame vertical . And off you go, he does supply a plate to bolt onto rivnuts for the firewall because access around the fuel tank is tricky, pah!! just use a coupe of socket extensions.
I was a bit perplexed at first, but its a doddle

Hi,
Thanks for the response, it clears up the questions, I'll take a look at his site.

Cheers

Could still do with a couple of pics as even the website pics are not that specific/clear.

Cheers
